title: Trailer: Urvi | Kannada Movie News - Times of India

organizations.name: kannada movie news - times of india witness the power of shakthi

text:
Witness the Power of Shakthi (energy), Yukthi (intelligence) and Bhakthi (devotion) come together as one in the name of Urvi ....
Urvi is a film about three girls whose issues bring them together to fight a greater evil. Cast includes Sruthi Hariharan , Shraddha Srinath , Shweta Pandit , Achyuth Kumar,Bhavani Prakash, Madhukar, Prabhu Mundkur,Vasuki Vaibhav, Janvi Jyothi.
The film has been directed by Pradeep Varma
Watch the trailer of Urvi here.
